resources.string:
1. If you want to find the weather by 
 latitute and longitute you must make 
 sure your device location is tured on. 
 And then set the coordinates from 
 setting option and after set the data 
 just click the get weather but button.

2. If you want to find the weather by 
 city and country code you must make 
 sure put the values. After that set the 
 values by clicking Set Values button
 setting option and after set the data 
 and click the get weather but button.

3. If you want to find the weather by 
 postal and country code you make 
 sure put the values. After that set the 
 values by clicking Set Values button
 setting option and after set the data 
 and click the get weather but button.

4. If you want to find the weather by 
 city code you must make sure you put 
 sure put the values. After that set the 
 values by clicking Set Values button
 setting option and after set the data 
 and click the get weather but button.
